node.data: {"title-section":{"title":"Generate Design Token","description":"The generate design token library is a library that provides convenience for defining design tokens in JSON format."},"useage-section":{"list":{"item1":"You can use the value of a token that is defined using a reference value.","item2":"You can reference different tokens when creating composite properties as well as single properties.","item3":"A simple rule can save you the trouble of rewriting duplicate token values."}},"tryit-section":{"example1":"Example - Reference Value","example2":"Example - Reference Key"}}
